description:
The oldest one (15) among girls under Willem`s care.
Compatible with using "dug weapon", current wielder of Seniorious, one of the special greatswords used by Heroes of the past. The name of the sword is now also a part of her own name.
Short-tempered, earnest girl respected by little ones. Easily gets angry when Willem is treating her like younger kids.
name: Chtholly Nota Seniorious
